heist

Class GeneralRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • heist.GeneralRepository

  • public class GeneralRepository
extends java.lang.Object
    The general repository stores all the components of the system. It is a shared memory region that is accessed by every active entity in the system. It is also responsible for starting and killing all running instances.
